column4: The other day, someone gave me a command so i could see what files were linked to a specific application... I forgot it :$
this also removes applications I still use
I just want to remove applications I cant and dont use anymor
do not list it in the remove command. or if you are using autoremove. reinstall only those apps you still use
that list does not work, at all.
I just noticed I'm using up 200GB of my hd, and all I have is 50gb music. so 150gb of ubuntu/kubuntu stuff....
then use Aplications>Accesories>Disk use analizer. to find out where the space is going
I dont have that tool anymore (cant find it) I'm already on kubuntu.
there should be a kde equivalent... ask in #kubuntu
